name: Gun Go SHOOT
description:
Fight your way through the waves of enemy AIs!

Your goal is to get to the highest wave you can reach (the developer reached wave 28, can you beat that? Comment if you do and send a screenshot, if possible).

This game was made by a 14 year-old Indie Game Dev (Solo developer), so expect some bugs. Please report any bugs by writing a comment.

Controls:
  • WASD to move.
  • Space to jump.
  • Move mouse to aim.
  • Left mouse button to shoot.
  • Right mouse button to use melee (Close ranged sword/knife)
  • Escape to pause (There is a button the top right of the screen to pause).
  • Play the tutorial to have a better understanding.
